name: Elementalz (Auregc)
description: A long time ago a meteor, that carried some crystal living form, hit this inhabited planet. With their powers, they surrounded themself with elements and materials that had nearby. After their civilization made a lot of progress. Political issues rise, leaving them in war.  Each side decided to make their own country and they dissipated through the land. War kept coming, so they invented a weapon that could end it all. These powerful cards ended almost every kingdom. The only thing that is left now, is the ruins of the ancient battle and the governors of these lands.
